segments.text: My eyes are drawn to the left side of the kitchen now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: There's a small boy precariously balanced on a stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's reaching up into an open cabinet, towards a cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly see the label “COOKIE JAR” inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His hand is already in there, grabbing cookies, I bet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Another plate is in his other hand, perhaps to collect them.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This stool looks incredibly unstable, almost tipping backward.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall at any moment; it makes me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A little girl is standing nearby, looking up expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's got her hand raised, ready to receive her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are definitely conspiring to get those cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a classic childhood caper, quite mischievous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The adult is completely unaware of their little adventure.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope the stool doesn't give way before they succeed.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: What a moment of secret joy for them.
segments.speaker: PAR
